definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Tomorrow, the House of Commons will see the third and final reading of the Health Bill.
sentences.chinese: 明天，議會下院將進行健康法案的最終審讀。

sentences.english: The manager surveyed her report with approbation.
sentences.chinese: 經理讚許地審讀她的報告。

sentences.english: Last of all, the chief editor read it and approved it.
sentences.chinese: 最後主編審讀了這篇稿子，並批准發表了。

sentences.english: First, with Jay Chou and Wu to the finest creations of their own reading.
sentences.chinese: 一次，周杰倫又拿著自己的得意之作送給吳宗憲審讀。

sentences.english: The page proofs have been read and approved by the responsible reader .
sentences.chinese: 拼版樣已經審稿人審讀通過。
